channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Best Quiz

item.title: CVE-2022-3739|2024-08-03T01:20:57.523Z -- unknown -- wp%20best%20quiz
item.description: The WP Best Quiz WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not sanitize and escape some parameters, which could allow users with a role as low as Author to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
